text: Secret Beyond the Door... is a 1947 American thriller movie directed by Fritz Lang and starring Michael Redgrave, Joan Bennett, Marie Harmon, Anne Revere, Barbara O'Neil, Natalie Schafer, Paul Cavanagh, Anabel Shaw, James Seay, Rosa Rey. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang
title: Secret Beyond the Door...
